guoqinguitext1.text:
1. Log into game to get a free Naruto, a new character from the "Chapter of Shadow" series.
2. Develop &name to Level 3 in the event and get Sasuke, a new character from the "Chapter of Shadow" series.
3. Total 100 RMB in recharge during the event and get the new Violent Sakura from the "Chapter of Shadow".
Note: Above characters are exclusive to the event and cannot be acquired in regular game.

slavepagetext15.text: Your slaves are working hard, for which they should be praised.

slavepagetext16.text: You should be proud of the diligent effort and give praise!

slavepagetext22.text: You flogged the slaves and now they are working harder.

slavepagetext23.text: You flogged &slave and now they are working harder.

slavepagetext25.text: Insufficient item. Spend 20 Bottlecaps to buy and use?

slavepagetext28.text: You offered cake as a reward to your slave.

slavepagetext29.text: You offered leftover cake as a reward to &name.

slavepagetext30.text: You're only brown-nosing to trim time off your servitude.

slavepagetext31.text: You're only subservient with a huge smile to curry your master &master's favor.

slavepagetext33.text: You popped your master's tire in revenge.

slavepagetext34.text: You thrust a spike into your master &master's tires!

slavepagetext36.text: Your slave's working hours are not full，Would you sure to set him free?

noticetext1.text: Congratulations for finishing 1st in Double-7th and winning a Android cell phone, plus 300 Bottlecaps! Please contact topani@126.com to receive physical prize.

noticetext2.text: Congratulations for finishing 2nd in Double-7th and winning a Chicken Little doll, plus 500 Bottlecaps! Please contact topani@126.com to receive physical prize.

noticetext3.text: Congratulations for finishing 3rd in Double-7th and winning a Maubert doll, plus 400 Bottlecaps! Please contact topani@126.com to receive physical prize.

noticetext4.text: Congratulations for finishing in #&rank in Double-7th and winning 200 Bottlecaps!

noticetext6.text: Congratulations for winning 50 Bottlecaps in Double-7th Matchmaking Party!

noticetext7.text: Congratulations for finishing in #&rank in The Great Parkour Race and winning &token Bottlecaps!

noticetext10.text: Sorry, you did not finish in the top 10 in The Great Parkour Race, but here are &token Bottlecaps as consolation prize.

achievedatadesc1001.text: "Left or right...? I'll take the middle."

achievedatadesc1002.text: "My footprints are all over the world!"

achievedatadesc1005.text: "All I want is gold, and silver… and money!"

achievedatadesc1007.text: "What are roads? Can you eat them?"

achievedatadesc1009.text: "I'm the only opponent you should fear!"

achievedatadesc1010.text: "Come with me if you want to make money."

achievedatadesc1011.text: "I have no idea how much money I got."

achievedatadesc1012.text: "You can't hope to beat me when it comes to wealth."

achievedatadesc1015.text: "Got any harder difficulty I can try?"

achievedatadesc1016.text: "Give me a minute and I'll clear the stage..."

achievedatadesc1017.text: "I got the hookup so I'm afraid of who again?"

achievedatadesc1021.text: "I love watching people scrambling beneath me."

achievedatadesc1022.text: "I made it to the top, even if just for a day."

achievedatadesc1024.text: "Are you a great player or not?"

achievedatadesc1026.text: "I love watching people scrambling beneath me."

achievedatadesc1027.text: "I love watching people scrambling beneath me."

achievedatadesc1030.text: "Don't need anyone's pity when I still got money."

achievedatadesc1031.text: "Is it true that you might get a wish when you log in?"

achievedatadesc1032.text: "It's not easy to log in every day."

achievedatadesc1041.text: "How many times I have to tell you before you'll listen?"

achievedatadesc1045.text: "So many Stars, so little time for counting…"

achievedatadesc1046.text: "One small step for me, one giant leap for mankind!"

achievedatadesc1049.text: "No rest for the wicked, so you better keep working!"

achievedatadesc1050.text: "You don't tell me what to do!"

achievedatadesc1051.text: "I'll save the expired cake for the slaves as a treat!"

achievedatadesc3001.text: 每日首次死亡分享获得咖啡

sharetext1.text: The more you see someone, the tighter you become, so visit more often!

sharetext2.text: I belong to you now, so take good care of me!

sharetext3.text: I'll go where the money is.

sharetext5.text: You just look good behind papa! (cute)

sharetext7.text: Making the rankings is just a minor step.

sharetext9.text: Come, friend, you can rely on me!

sharetext10.text: It sure is lonely at the top.

sharetext11.text: You need to be 10x better before you can even hope to beat me!

sharetext12.text: I'm in the money, I'm in the money!

sharetext13.text: Would it kill you to let me win sometime?

sharetext14.text: I'll be rich soon enough! Who's with me?

sharetext15.text: This game is tough! We'll see how good you are.

sharetext18.text: The sun is shining brighter today.

sharetext19.text: Too people are trying to get some time with you. (giggle)

sharetext20.text: I'm good looking and rich, I rule!

sharetext21.text: I want you to come see me everyday!

sharetext22.text: Social darlings are out to recruit stars!

sharetext23.text: Be envious that everybody loves me.

sharetext24.text: I'm good looking and popular, I rule!

sharetext25.text: See all this? It's everything I fought for you!

sharetext27.text: Let me get it ready and we can be on the road. (smile)

sharetext28.text: Found another good spot for our date.

sharetext29.text: You understand me, you complete me.

sharetext30.text: I don't fear the new, I just miss the old.

sharetext31.text: Want to know which is my favorite room?

sharetext32.text: I collected &star Stars in The Adventures of Chicken Little!

sharetext33.text: I'm at the Stage &chapter in The Adventure of Chicken Little. Can you top that?

sharetext34.text: Go ahead, keep calling for help till you're hoarse, nobody's coming.

sharetext1001.text: I got JiXiaoDe, a new character in "The Adventures of JiXiaoDe", an incredibly fun game you should play too!

sharetext1002.text: I got XiaoMei, a new character in "The Adventures of JiXiaoDe", an incredibly fun game you should play too!

sharetext1003.text: I got FaTiao, a new character in "The Adventures of JiXiaoDe", an incredibly fun game you should play too!

sharetext1004.text: I got Lian, a new character in "The Adventures of JiXiaoDe", an incredibly fun game you should play too!

sharetext1005.text: I got GuLaoBan, a new character in "The Adventures of JiXiaoDe", an incredibly fun game you should play too!

sharetext1006.text: I got ShaSha, a new character in "The Adventures of JiXiaoDe", an incredibly fun game you should play too!

sharetext1007.text: I got YuJie, a new character in "The Adventures of JiXiaoDe", an incredibly fun game you should play too!

sharetext1008.text: I got HuiHui, a new character in "The Adventures of JiXiaoDe", an incredibly fun game you should play too!

sharetext1031.text: I got Naruto, a new character in "The Adventures of JiXiaoDe", an incredibly fun game you should play too!

sharetext1032.text: I got Sasuke, a new character in "The Adventures of JiXiaoDe", an incredibly fun game you should play too!

sharetext1033.text: I got  Violent Sakura, a new character in "The Adventures of JiXiaoDe", an incredibly fun game you should play too!

sharetext2005.text: I'm feeling cool walking on the trail.

sharetext7001.text: 我敢打赌，你拿到的万圣节礼物不会比我好！不信来试试？

skilldataoverview5.text: Gain bonus score after clearing a stage.

skilldataoverview6.text: Gain bonus Money after clearing a stage.

skilldataoverview7.text: 1 time per stage, respawn and restore HP.

skilldataoverview8.text: A chance of activating paper plane for a duration after taking damage.

skilldataoverview9.text: Recover HP per 5 obstacles cleared, with a 30-second cooldown.

skilldataoverview10.text: Improves chance of getting item rewards after clearing a stage.

skilldataoverview11.text: A chance of activating a shield for a duration after taking damage.

skilldataoverview13.text: A chance of recovering 1 Stamina after clearing a stage.

skilldataoverview14.text: Summon a clone to take damage for you.

skilldataoverview15.text: Create extra clones, each one provides a recovery.

skilldataoverview16.text: Creates extra clones, each one able to soak more damage.

skilldataoverview17.text: Summon Entity of Valor to soak damage for you.

skilldataoverview18.text: Entity of Valor converts damage received into HP.

skilldataoverview19.text: Gain a HP recovery when Entity of Valor expires.

skilldataoverview21.text: Gain Marking, all items provide HP recovery.

skilldataoverview22.text: Gain Marking, improved healing while Marked.

skilldatadesc5.text: Gain <font color=0xff0000>&data%</font> bonus points after clearing a stage.

skilldatadesc6.text: Gain <font color=0xff0000>&data%</font> bonus Bottlecaps after clearning a stage

skilldatadesc7.text: time per game, instant respawn upon death and recover <font color=0xff0000>&data%</font> of maximum HP

skilldatadesc8.text: <font color=0xff0000>&data%</font> chance of activating Paper Plane for 5 seconds when dealt damage.

skilldatadesc9.text: Recover <font color=0xff0000>&data</font> HP per 5 obstacles leaped; activates 1 time every 30 seconds and resets after 5th obstacle leaped.

skilldatadesc10.text: +<font color=0xff0000>&data%</font> to get items after clearing a stage

skilldatadesc11.text: 30% chance of manifesting a shield lasting 5 seconds that soaks up to <font color=0xff0000>&data</font> HP. Excess damage ends the shield; its effect does not stack.

skilldatadesc13.text: <font color=0xff0000>&data%</font> chance of recovering 1 Stamina after clearing a stage.

skilldatadesc14.text: Summon <font color=0xff0000>2</font> clones for 5 seconds, each can soak up to <font color=0xff0000>&data</font> points of damage

skilldatadesc15.text: +<font color=0xff0000>1</font> clone when using Shadow Clones. Original character recovers <font color=0xff0000>&data</font> HP every second per clone present.

skilldatadesc16.text: +<font color=0xff0000>1</font> clone when using Shadow Clones, each clone can soak <font color=0xff0000>&data%</font> more points of damage

skilldatadesc17.text: Summon Entity of Valor for 5 seconds that can soak up to <font color=0xff0000>&data</font> points of damage. Excess damage ends the Entity.

skilldatadesc18.text: Entity of Valor converts <font color=0xff0000>&data%</font> points of damage into HP

skilldatadesc19.text: Recover up to <font color=0xff0000>&data%</font> HP when Entity of Valor ends

skilldatadesc21.text: Battery activates for 5 seconds upon regeneration, during which any item can heal <font color=0xff0000>&data</font> HP

skilldatadesc22.text: Immune to damage while Life Battery is in effect, and gain +<font color=0xff0000>&data%</font> to all recoveries

chaptertipdatadesc1.text: Paper Plane: Ride a paper plane to auto-fly over all obstacles, but watch out, it only lasts for a short while!

chaptertipdatadesc2.text: Mines: Look out for mines, you're not tough enough to handle one yet!

chaptertipdatadesc3.text: Potions: The designers put these in the game to heal you. Just open one to get HP back!

chaptertipdatadesc4.text: Random Chests: Each one contains various mystery items for you to try your luck!

chaptertipdatadesc5.text: Random Chests: Each one contains various mystery items for you to try your luck!

chaptertipdatadesc6.text: Snow: Chilly weather that deals damage every 3 seconds, plus extra freezing damage if you get caught in it too many times!

chaptertipdatadesc7.text: Pay attention to the Bottlecaps under your feet, for they are the primary game currency, so don't skip over them!

loadingtipdesc1.text: It costs Stamina to challenge a stage, but you can recover Stamina gradually with time.

loadingtipdesc2.text: Use small leaps and big leaps to hurdle obstacles, but don't miss Bottlecaps in the meantime!

loadingtipdesc3.text: It costs Energy to use an active skill, but you can recover Energy with time.

loadingtipdesc4.text: You recover Energy spent for big leaps and small leaps at different rates.

loadingtipdesc5.text: There's always an event at 12:00 and 18:00 every day, don't miss it!

loadingtipdesc6.text: Shadow Clones can both soak damage for you and restore HP

loadingtipdesc7.text: Violent Sakura is a tremendous healer.

loadingtipdesc8.text: Sasuke's cool ghostly armor that can convert damage into recovery!

loadingtipdesc9.text: A master can exploit slaves every day for big profits.

loadingtipdesc10.text: Every slave thinks about how he can become the master everyday.

loadingtipdesc11.text: Think the stages are tough? Try Endless and see what tough really means!

eventsdatarule101.text:
1. Get 1 point per Stamina spent during event. 
2. Qualify for reward at a certain score.
3. You can claim reward only once per phase.

eventsdatarule102.text:
1. Get 1 point for every 100 Bottlecaps spent during event.
2. Qualify for reward at a certain score.
3. You can claim reward only once per phase.

eventsdatarule103.text:
1. Get 1 point per Bottlecap spent during event.
2. Qualify for reward at a certain score. 
3. You can claim reward only once per phase.

eventsdatarule104.text:
1. Get 1 point for clearing any 1 stage during event.
2. Qualify for reward at a certain score.
3. You can claim reward only once per phase.

eventsdatarule105.text:
1. Get 1 point per respawn in a stage during event.
2. Qualify for reward at a certain score.
3. You can claim reward only once per phase.

eventsdatarule106.text:
1. Get 1 point per slave captured during event.
2. Qualify for reward at a certain score.
3. You can claim reward only once per phase.

eventsdatarule201.text:
1. Get 1 point per Stamina spent during event.
2. Rankings are determined by scores from high to low.
3. Claim rewards according to rank within 24 hours following the event; all unclaimed rewards are forfeited after 24 hours.
4. Ranking Reward can only be claimed once.

eventsdatarule202.text:
1. Get 1 point for every 100 Money spent during event.
2. Rankings are determined by scores from high to low.
3. Claim rewards according to rank within 24 hours following the event; all unclaimed rewards are forfeited after 24 hours.
4. Ranking Reward can only be claimed once.

eventsdatarule203.text:
1. Get 1 point per Bottlecap spent during event.
2. Rankings are determined by scores from high to low.
3.Claim rewards according to rank within 24 hours following the event; all unclaimed rewards are forfeited after 24 hours.
4. Ranking Reward can only be claimed once.

eventsdatarule204.text:
1. Get 1 point for clearing any 1 stage during event.
2. Rankings are determined by scores from high to low.
3. Claim rewards according to rank within 24 hours following the event; all unclaimed rewards are forfeited after 24 hours.
4. Ranking Reward can only be claimed once.

eventsdatarule205.text:
1. Get 1 point per respawn in a stage during event.
2. Rankings are determined by scores from high to low.
3. Claim rewards according to rank within 24 hours following the event; all unclaimed rewards are forfeited after 24 hours.
4. Ranking Reward can only be claimed once.

eventsdatarule206.text:
1. Get 1 point per slave captured during event.
2. Rankings are determined by scores from high to low.
3. Claim rewards according to rank within 24 hours following the event; all unclaimed rewards are forfeited after 24 hours.
4. Ranking Reward can only be claimed once.

maildatatext1.text: You've been captured and enslaved by &master. Life is going to be rough for you now.

maildatatext2.text: &master tried to capture and enslave you without success.

maildatatext3.text: &master has captured you and your slaves have all ran away. Life is going to be rough for you now.

maildatatext4.text: Your &slave has escaped servitude and is now free.

maildatatext5.text: Hallelujah, your master has been defeated and you can resume a free life!

maildatatext6.text: Your hard work is rewarded as you took a portion of your wages when you left your master.

maildatatext7.text: Your slave &slave has escaped after reading "72 Ways to Jailbreak". All you could retrieve was a portion of his savings.

maildatatext8.text: Your slave &slave is acting suspciously, perhaps intending to escape, and should be watched closely.

maildatatext9.text: Your slave &slave has paid you a large sum to buy freedom.

maildatatext10.text: Your master &master has amicably given you your freedom back!

maildatatext11.text: Your hard labor is rewarded as you get paid for your service.

maildatatext12.text: Your perseverance paid off as you've regained freedom, along with the proper reward you deserved!

maildatatext13.text: The contract for your slave &slave is up, and he expressed gratitude before he left to enjoy newfound freedom.

maildatatext14.text: You've gained the title "Upstart" and may begin capture slaves for yourself.

maildatatext15.text: You've gained the title "Unscrupulous Boss" and may expand your roster of slaves.

maildatatext16.text: You've gained the title "Rampant Terror", but look out for others trying to capture you back!

maildatatext17.text: You've gained the title "Money Makes Right" and are past the point of return on the road to ultimate evil!

maildatatext18.text: &master tells you, "You've done well lately, so in 365 months I will consider making you full-time so you can get paid!"

maildatatext19.text: While whipping you, &master says, "I'm flogging you for your own good and because I love you!"

maildatatext20.text: "You've been working very hard, &slave, and you should get more nourishment," says &master, as a half-eaten chicken thigh is shoved into your mouth.

maildatatext21.text: Said &slave as you are handed a little red flower, "It is my honor and pleasure to make you happy!"

maildatatext22.text: "You miserable, pathetic bully!" thought &slave, as a spike punctured a tire of your car.

radiodatatext1.text: &name used unmatched speed and nimbleness to take 1st place in The Great Parkour Race!

radiodatatext2.text: &name grabbed 2nd place in The Great Parkour Race with undeterred resolve!

radiodatatext3.text: &name overcame obstacles and broke through in The Great Parkour Race for a 3rd-place finish!

radiodatatext4.text: The legendary manual speed that earned &name 1st place in the rankings shall now enter the history book!

radiodatatext5.text: &name has attained 2nd place in rankings amid great excitement!

radiodatatext6.text: &name stood out and placed 3rd in the rankings!

radiodatatext7.text: The legendary manual speed that earned &name 1st place in the daily rankings shall now enter the history book!

radiodatatext8.text: &name has attained 2nd place in daily rankings amid great excitement!

radiodatatext9.text: &name stood out and placed 3rd in daily rankings!

radiodatatext11.text: &name had a moment of brilliance and cleared Stage &chapter in Stage Mode!
